entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -15.3°C
entry.summary:
